addon.name: Recurring billing
addon.description: Deprecated. To be excluded from v. 4.1.1. Learn more in the official announcement.

translations.item: Устаревший модуль. Данный модуль будет исключен из базовой поставки, начиная с версии 4.1.1. Узнайте больше в официальном анонсе.
可以定期订购并设置状态通知

item.name: Number of attempts after order failed

translations.item: 在定单失败后尝试次数
Следующая попытка, если заказ не удался (дни)
若定单失败后下次尝试(天)

queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:recurring_plans ( `plan_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `price` text NOT NULL, `product_ids` text NOT NULL, `period` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `by_period` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `pay_day` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `duration` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `start_price` text NOT NULL, `start_duration` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `start_duration_type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'D', `allow_change_duration` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `allow_unsubscribe` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `allow_free_buy` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`plan_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:recurring_subscriptions ( `subscription_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `order_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `plan_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `user_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `firstname` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `lastname` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `email` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `last_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `end_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `order_ids` text NOT NULL, `product_ids` text NOT NULL, `start_price` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `price` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `duration` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `orig_duration` mediumint(8) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`subscription_id`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:recurring_events ( `event_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `subscription_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `event_type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'C', PRIMARY KEY (`event_id`), KEY `subscription_id` (`subscription_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
ALTER TABLE ?:usergroups ADD `recurring_plans_ids` varchar(255) NOT NULL default ''

Обработать события ››

Към събитията ››
Не е позволена промяната на анулирани абонаменти

Дава възможност на клиентите да настройват период

ще бъдат изтрити заедно с поръчката
